title: PBE: Error 500
body: i just tried signing up for the PBE and it came up with the ERROR 500 message. Does this mean something is wrong with the site? or does it mean the PBE is closed for sign ups?

replies.body:
Eeek, this is quite an annoying error. :/

This issue can typically be resolved with the following steps:

1. [**Clear your browser's cache**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) to ensure no leftover temp files are exacerbating this situation.
___
2. Visit the [NA landing page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/), then login to your account.
____
3. Visit the [NA PBE Signup Page](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe) and proceed to finish your application.
___
Please let me know if this worked for you!
i deleted the browser history and everything else I could delete and its still popping up with the error 500. Is there only certain days they have the sign ups available?

Ah, that means there's likely an issue with your network routing to that specific page. You should be able to work around this by using a VPN such as [**Cyberghost**](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/en_us) or [**Hotspot Shield**](https://www.hotspotshield.com/).

Let me know if this worked for you. ^.^
that actually did work thank you
Im still having this error after 4 months of being accepted, i have tried both of the VPN's and cleared my cache and browser from chrome. Please help me.
